#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    char str[120000];
    int count,count1,i,t,maxima;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {maxima=0;

    cin>>str;
    count=count1=0;
    for(i=0;str[i]!=0;i++)
    {
        if(str[i]=='0')
        {
            count++;
        }
        else
        {
            count1++;
            if(count>0) count--;
        }
        if(count>maxima)
        maxima=count;
    }
    if(count1==i) cout<<count1-1<<"\n";
    else
    cout<<count1+maxima<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
